text: Svend Otto Lund (born April 1, 1949) is a former Danish handball player who competed in the 1972 Summer Olympics.Sports-Reference profile Olympics at Sports-Reference.com > Athletes > Svend Lund He played his club handball with IF Stadion. In 1972 he was part of the Danish team which finished thirteenth in the Olympic tournament. He played three matches and scored one goal. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Danish male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Denmark Category:Handball players at the 1972 Summer Olympics
title: Svend Lund
